mapper.select: SELECT sh.shipid, sh.shipdate, sh.shipcode, sh.workcode, st.itemid, it.itemname, it.clientcode, sh.shipcount, sh.shipsts, sh.membercode FROM ship sh LEFT JOIN stock st ON sh.stockid = st.stockid LEFT JOIN item it ON st.itemid = it.itemid

SELECT wk.workid, wk.membercode, wk.workdate1, wk.workdate2, wk.worksts, wk.workcount, wk.workupdate, wk.workcode, wk.itemcode, wk.pocode, wk.receiptid, wk.produceid, wk.clinetcode, wk.recordcount, wk.returncode FROM work wk JOIN purchaseorder po ON wk.pocode = po.pocode
